embed.title: Chione
embed.description: An attrition hero who suppresses enemy’s attack while smothering the enemy with her own attack.

fields.name: Active Skill: Freezing Field
fields.value:
• Chione’s <Freezing Field> skill summons a blizzard that freezes enemy units in the targeted area.
• The blizzard will deal damage to the targeted enemy units while disregarding any damage reduction effect (Selene’s <Moonlight Projection>, Arthur’s <Avalon> and Stone Golem’s <The Will of the Stone> skills).
• Any damage reduction will still apply to other forms of attack (e.g. Chione’s basic attack and attacks by allied units).
• Range: 8

fields.name: Passive Skill: Frost
fields.value: • Chione will reduce enemy attack speed and movement.

fields.name: Legendary Skill: Frost Prison
fields.value:
• After several basic attacks, awakened Chione will trigger the <Frost Prison> skill which freezes targeted enemy units.
• <Frost Prison> increases damage dealt to enemy units frozen by either <Freezing Field> or <Frost Prison>.
• The damage increase applies to both basic attacks and skill damages, including damage from Voodoo Dolls’ <Destiny Bond> skill.
• Trigger Number: 3
• Range: 3

fields.name: Arena Troops
fields.value:
